review_data.title: Awesome and authentic Viet food!
review_data.content: It is really the best and most authenic Vietnamese food we found in Zurich. Very fair prices and nice owners. It is one of our fav go to Restaurants in Zurich! Higly recommended.

review_data.title: Great

review_data.title: Simple place but excellent foot
review_data.content: We had a very good dinner at this restaurant. Really authentic food in a simple setting at reasonable prices. From starter, to main to desert nothing to complain about. Guess I have found my new favourite place for Vietnamese food in Zürich.

review_data.title: Delicious Vietnamese food at a very good price!
review_data.content: This family run restaurant was a pleasant surprise for Zurich. A place where one can have a very tasty Asian main course for around 20 chf. The food is made from fresh ingredients and seems to be really authentic. Their soups seems to be very...More

review_data.title: Nice, efficient, neat casual place. Great tofu pho.
review_data.content: Came here for lunch alone. There was plenty of space and the food came quickly. The pho was really good, a flavourful vegan broth, pak choi, other vegetables and herbs. I will go back.

review_data.title: Good fresh food
review_data.content: Reasonably priced, decent meal, nice and clean. Violently hot chilli sauce! Had the seafood and pork noodle soup. Will be back.

review_data.title: Tasty & fragrant
review_data.content: I had the beef and vegetable dish and my friend had a soup. Both were excellent. We've eaten in Vietnamese restaurants all over the world and this didn't disappoint. Very friendly attentive staff too.
